rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: Notification is triggered when only Assignment Group is populated or updated and Assignee field is blank
rule.condition: (same(assignment in $L.file.save, NULL) or not (same(assignment in $L.file.save, assignment in $L.file))) and not (same(assignment in $L.file, NULL)) and same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL)
rule.conditionDesc: (( assignment in SavedRecord = NULL OR assignment in SavedRecord != assignment in CurrentRecord) AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL AND assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL)
